issue.title: Test 3
issue.body:
The desktop app needs a GitHub integration status indicator showing whether the app is properly connected to GitHub and can access the configured repository.

**Current behavior:** Users have no visibility into whether GitHub authentication is working or if the repository is accessible. Issues only appear (or fail to appear) when explicitly fetched.

**Desired behavior:** Display a status indicator in the UI that shows:
- Connection status (connected/disconnected/error)
- Currently configured repository (owner/repo)
- Authentication state (authenticated/unauthenticated)

**Implementation notes:**
- Add a status component to the sidebar or header area
- Use the existing `gh` CLI integration to check authentication status
- Poll or check status on app startup and periodically thereafter
- Show actionable error messages when connection fails (e.g., "Run `gh auth login` to authenticate")
